name: Bastiodon
flavorText:
Any frontal attack is repulsed.
It is a docile Pokémon that
feeds on grass and berries.

previous.name: Shieldon
previous.flavorText:
A Pokémon that lived in jungles
around 100 million years ago. Its
facial hide is extremely hard.

next.name: Burmy
next.flavorText:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry
winds, it covers itself with a cloak
made of twigs and leaves.
next.formDescription: Forms only affect appearance, although they become permanent upon evolution.  Wild and newly-hatched Burmy are always in a Plant Cloak.  Burmy's cloak changes to match the terrain after a battle it participated in: Plant Cloak by default; Sandy Cloak in sandy or rocky areas, such as beaches, caves, and trails; and Trash Cloak in buildings.
